<title level="1" right="Rules">[Comparison](/Rules.aspx?ID=2926)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
First, look at similar items. For example, if you want a permanent item that lets someone fly, look at the _flying broomstick_, which moves of its own volition to a location and thus can't be used to gain a huge advantage in combat, and winged sandals, which can. This will give you an idea of the right level range and the specifics and limitations of existing items. You might even be able to just adjust one of those to get what you want with minimal work.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
